command: [REDACTED: Non-executable placeholder] Event-log exfil loop: map \\ATTACKER_IP\logs$ with 'net use', periodically export logs and append a hostname/timestamp, copy to UNC, then unmap.
explanation: Conceptual periodic export-and-send of system logs to a remote SMB share created with 'net use', supporting automated, silent exfiltration.

Export relevant event logs to a timestamped file
Copy the export to the remote UNC location
Remove the SMB mapping after transfer completes
